name: Rave Rudders
description:
"Rave Rudders"

WASD - To move

Space - Sail faster

Escape - Pauses Game

Collect Green "Rave Boats" and deliver to lighthouse

Red "Rave Enhancer Boats" will ocassionally start a Rave of Green boats using sparklers.

Couldn't make everything I wanted to in 48 hours but what can you do :)
